Posts.Content: vivianu wrote: I had a mastectomy almost a year ago and am 'wearing' a temporary expander until I decide saline vs. silicone. I've done a lot of research on them both, and it graduallt dawned on me that there is a third option - no reconstruction! I am turning 65 this year, long-divorced and not really interested in looking for a new mate... I would be very grateful to hear from any of you who have opted NOT to have reconstruction - what made you decide, and are you happy with your choice? Many thanks - Vivian Log in to post a reply
